National Museum of Egyptian Civilization (NMEC) bụ nnukwu ebe ngosi nka (490,000 uare mita (5,300,000 sq )) nke dị na Old Cairo, mpaghara nke Cairo, Egypt

N'ịbụ nke e meghere n'ụzọ ụfọdụ na 2017, Onye isi ala Abdel Fattah El-Sisi meghere ebe ngosi ihe mgbe ochie ahụ na 3 Eprel 2021, site na ịkwaga 22 ozu, gụnyere ndị eze 18 na ndị eze nwanyị anọ, site na Ebe Ngosi Ihe Mgbe Ochie Ijipt na etiti Cairo, na ihe omume a na-akpọ Fero's Golden Parade. Ebe ngosi ihe mgbe ochie ahụ na-egosipụta nchịkọta nke ihe ochie 50,000, na-egosi mmepeanya Ijipt site n'oge tupu akụkọ ihe mere eme ruo taa
A na-ekewa mkpokọta na-adịgide adịgide na mpaghara abụọ dị iche iche;  otu usoro oge ma nke ọzọ bụ isiokwu
Mpaghara usoro iheomume bụ ndị a: Archaic, Pharaonic, Greco-Roman, Coptic, Medieval, islam, ọgbara ọhụrụ na nke ugbu a
Mpaghara isiokwu ndị a bụ: Dawn of Civilization, The Nile, Writing, State and Society, Material Culture, Beliefs and Thinking and Gallery of Royal Mummies
UNESCO nyere aka oru aka na ngosi nka.

A ga-ewere nchịkọta ndị ahụ site na ebe ngosi ihe mgbe ochie ndị ọzọ dị ka Egyptian Museum, Coptic Museum, Museum of Islamic Art, Manial Palace and Museum na Cairo, na Royal Jewelry Museum na Alexandria.
Na ngwụcha afọ 2017, Zahi Hawass kọrọ na Francis Ricciardone, onye isi oche nke Mahadum America dị na Cairo, nyere 5,000 n'ime ihe ndị ọ rụpụtara na National Museum of Egyptian Civilization.
Ebe ngosi ihe mgbe ochie ahụ kwadoro mmeri ikpeazụ nke 2021 World Men's Handball Championship.
